summary: REQ-1 appears implemented in the footer: the attribution link now points to https://webzio.caffeine.app and displays "webzio.caffeine.app" with target="_blank" and rel="noopener noreferrer". However, the diff also includes unrequested changes to internal tracking/summary files that mention broader SEO/title/meta updates (even though those underlying files are not shown as modified here).

hallucinated_features.description: Updated internal documentation/summary to describe additional SEO/title/meta/favicon changes beyond the requested footer link update.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly limits changes to the requested footer attribution link and states no SEO metadata changes beyond that; the diff includes a modified summary file describing broader SEO metadata changes.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified project state tracking entries (new_feature_requests statuses/entries) not requested by the BuildRequest.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not request updating project tracking metadata; only a footer link change is requested.
